label: ham
subject: Re: Debian GNU/Linux (kfreebsd anyone?) Lenny Desktop wishlist	thread
body: And can you mention any pursuit of mankind in which the male sex has not all these gifts and qualities in a higher degree than the female? Need I waste time in speaking of the art of weaving, and the management of pancakes and preserves, in which womankind does really appear to be great, and in which for her to be beaten by a man is of all things the most absurd?
